verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add as\add* I \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, that the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* there upon me.

Then I \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w*, and lo a \w likeness|strong="H1823"\w* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: from the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* even \w downward|strong="H4295"\w*, \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; and from his \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* even \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w brightness|strong="H2096"\w*, as the \w colour|strong="H5869"\w* of \w amber|strong="H2830"\w*.

And he put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* the \w form|strong="H8403"\w* of an \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* me by a \w lock|strong="H6734"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* lifted me \w up|strong="H5375"\w* between the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* and the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me in the \w visions|strong="H4759"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*; where \add was\add* the \w seat|strong="H4186"\w* of the \w image|strong="H5566"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*, which provoketh to \w jealousy|strong="H7069"\w*.

And, behold, the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* there, according to the \w vision|strong="H4758"\w* that I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w plain|strong="H1237"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* now the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*. So I lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and behold \w northward|strong="H6828"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* this \w image|strong="H5566"\w* of \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* in the \w entry|strong="H0872"\w*.

He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* furthermore unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou what they \w do|strong="H6213"\w*? \add even\add* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w committeth|strong="H6213"\w* here, that I should go far \w off|strong="H7368"\w* from my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*? but \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thee yet again, \add and\add* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and when I \w looked|strong="H7200"\w*, behold \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w hole|strong="H2356"\w* in the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w dig|strong="H2864"\w* now in the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: and when I had \w digged|strong="H2864"\w* in the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, behold \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* here.

So I went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*; and behold every \w form|strong="H8403"\w* of creeping \w things|strong="H7431"\w*, and \w abominable|strong="H8263"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, and all the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w pourtrayed|strong="H2707"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w Jaazaniah|strong="H2970"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, with every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w censer|strong="H4730"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and a \w thick|strong="H6282"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* of \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* what the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in the \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w* of his \w imagery|strong="H4906"\w*? for they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* us not; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* also unto me, \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* thee yet again, \add and\add* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that they \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

Then he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which \add was\add* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*; and, behold, there \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* for \w Tammuz|strong="H8542"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*? \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* thee yet again, \add and\add* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* than these.

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me into the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and, behold, at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, between the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \add were\add* about \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, with their \w backs|strong="H0268"\w* toward the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*; and they \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*.

¶ Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*, O \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*? Is it a light \w thing|strong="H7043"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that they \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which they \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* here? for they have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, and have \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*: and, lo, they \w put|strong="H7971"\w* the \w branch|strong="H2156"\w* to their \w nose|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 8.17 \ft Is it…: or, Is there any thing lighter than to commit\f*

Therefore will I also \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*: mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither will I have \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*: and though they \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* with a \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add yet\add* will I not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* them.
